title: Hans Adiogo, Frontend Developer, UI/UX Designer
titleHome: I build things for the web.
desc: I’m a frontend developer, UI/UX designer, and graphic designer with a passion for creating intuitive and visually compelling digital experiences. With expertise in Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, and modern frontend frameworks, I specialize in building high-performance web applications with a seamless user experience.
aboutTxt1: I’m Jason, a frontend developer, UI/UX designer, and graphic designer with a passion for creating intuitive and visually compelling digital experiences. With expertise in Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, and modern frontend frameworks, I specialize in building high-performance web applications with a seamless user experience.
aboutTxt2: Beyond development, my skills extend to brand identity, illustration, and digital marketing, allowing me to craft designs that not only look great but also drive engagement. I’ve worked on a wide range of projects, from e-commerce platforms and SaaS applications to corporate websites and branding for startups.
aboutTxt3: Here are few technologies and tools I've worked with recently :
job1El1: Developed, maintained and shipped company's websites using WordPress
job2El1: Developed and styled interactive web applications for Danol using Angular and Bootstrap
job3El1: Developed and styled a web application for a client using Angular
job3El2: Collaborated with team to build the architecture for a large web application
job4El1: Implemented a CI chain with Jenkins
jobKrestEl1: Developed modern web applications using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Zustand, ensuring high performance and seamless user experience for various websites and web apps.
jobKrestEl2: Worked on UI/UX designs for various projets including websites, blogs, web apps.
project1: This project is a React web application for the website of a higher institute.
project2: Template website for a company which deliver food from restaurants.
project3: Business website for a company that offer electronic security services.
project4: Crypto trading web application in progress
project5: International money transfer platform, specialized in secure and instant transfer of funds to mobile wallets in Africa via Visa or Mastercard, with utmost safety.
project6: I had the opportunity to design and develop Le Carino's website, an online presence for a restaurant that redefines the pizza experience with high-quality ingredients and an irresistible menu.
projectSaga: Website for the Saga Africa restaurant, detailed order form, receipt generation
projectKrest: Website for the Krest Holding group, with a simple, uncluttered design, presenting Krest's activities.
contactContent: Got a project ? An Idea ? Feel free to contact me ! My inbox is always open.
